name: Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards
description:
Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards are a simple and easy to use expansion pack for create your own blank card games. Use these Rap and Hip-Hop themed Black Cards with your own collection of cards! These cards are inspired by classic games such as Cards Against Humanity™ and Apples to Apples™.

Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards contains over 150 new cards, each uniquely created using Rap and Hip-Hop lyrics from classic to contemporary songs, ranging from Biggie Smalls to Drake. This set of Black Cards can provide up to hours of fun for you and your friends!

Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards has a simple and clean interface which is designed for clear visibility and ease of use. Simply read the Black Card out loud and let your friends fill in the blank with their cards in their hand. It's that simple!

Note: Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards itself is not a game and is in no way affiliated with Cards Against Humanity™ or Apples to Apples™. Rap Hip-Hop Black Cards was meant to be used as an addition or expansion to these blank styled card games.

View these great games at:
Cards Against Humanity™: http://www.cardsagainsthumanity.com
Apples to Apples™: http://www.amazon.com/Apples-Party-Box-Combinations-Edition/dp/B00112CHCK
